item.title: The Crusade: Text Mining Trivium Songs
item.description: 1 A View of Mining Lyrics 2 Into the Mouth of R We March 3 Pull Harder on the Strings of Lyrics with geniusR 4 Text Dismantled 5 Anthem (We are the Functions) 6 Album That Spawned the Most Words 7 Tread the Words 8 Torn Between Term Frequency and Inverse Document Frequency 9 Negativity Thrives 10 These Sentiments Canâ€™t Tear Us Apart (Warning: NSFW Language)
